entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 3:32PM AKST until December 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...FRONT WILL BRING HEAVY SNOW TO THE HIGHWAYS... Snow has changed to rain near Haines, but has remained snow out the road and near the boarder. For Skagway, cold air and light winds have allowed for precipitation to remain snow near sea level. Wet and heavy snow is expected to continue for Skagway overnight with highest totals towards White Pass.

entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Volusia and Lake Counties. .The St. Johns River at Astor remains in Minor Flood stage and is forecast to hold steady through early next week as northeast winds become east Sunday and southeast Monday into Tuesday. The river will be very slow to fall beginning around the middle of next week.
